item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 4, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:

23. Trump's Trade War Escalates as China Retaliates with 34% Tariffs (37 points | 2 comments)

27. AI 2027 (570 points | 368 comments)
